<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_imt_core_user_privacy_notice_and_consent</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sn_imt_core_user_privacy_notice_and_consent">parentISEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Prevent duplicate insert of parent</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_imt_core_user_privacy_notice_and_consent'); gr.addQuery('user', current.getValue('user')); gr.addQuery('privacy_notice', current.getValue('privacy_notice')); gr.addEncodedQuery('parentISEMPTY'); gr.setLimit(1); gr.query(); if (gr.hasNext()) { current.setAbortAction(true); }
})(current, previous); ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-05-26 23:50:45</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>24bdc076d4d03010fa9bda5a8a134c39</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Prevent duplicate insert of parent</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="">fbd1bfe445b01010fa9b7ec6c81d77ce</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">fbd1bfe445b01010fa9b7ec6c81d77ce</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_24bdc076d4d03010fa9bda5a8a134c39</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-05-04 00:02:01</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=24bdc076d4d03010fa9bda5a8a134c39"/> </record_update>
